channel.title: Weed = Paranoia?
channel.description: One of my friends smoked a lot of weed for a long time (several times a day for a few months) and really enjoyed it, but recently stopped smoking entirely because he said he was paranoid. This isn't the first time I've heard this from someone who smoked weed - what causes this paranoia? What is my friend so paranoid about?

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Mopman:

in all the years I smoked I never really got any at all, then suddenly one day it just turned into the worst drug ever.

I am now paranoid that this will happen to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I too stopped smoking pretty much entirely because the paranoia got really bad. It’s kinda weird, actaully, because in all the years I smoked I never really got any at all, then suddenly one day it just turned into the worst drug ever.

I’m not the only person I know who says that either, but I don’t know why it is. Just one of them things. Some people keep smoking their whole life and loving it.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:8, topic:386998”]I only get paranoid if I’m in a situation I’m not entirely cool with. If I’m with mates inside then I’m fine.[/quote]As long as I am not in a car or did not just smoke and my house and my step dad gets home.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

That is definitely not what I would consider common knowledge. It should be, however.

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

This is so common knowledge that it is border-line embarrassing you ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

The law causes people to be paranoid… Even in situations where the law would never show up.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Depends on the person more than the weed honestly.

If you’re constantly smoking in really sketchy situations it’s obviously going to be more likely to happen than if you’re totally relaxed while toking.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Not sure, the only problem i’ve ever had with smoking weed was once I was walking around and my heart felt like it was going to explode.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed = Paranoia?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

I do at times get paranoid, but it really depends on the strain, and how much I’ve been smoking.
If I remember correctly, it has something to do with the ratio between Indica and Sativa, one of them induces paranoia, whereas the other doesn’t, or at least, to a lesser extent.

Read full topic

One of my friends smoked a lot of weed for a long time (several times a day for a few months) and really enjoyed it, but recently stopped smoking entirely because he said he was paranoid. This isn’t the first time I’ve heard this from someone who smoked weed - what causes this paranoia? What is my friend so paranoid about?
